message: I propose dividing the $100 in a 3:1 ratio. This offers a fair balance considering the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. While I understand your desire for a fair balance, I believe this split better reflects the value of money decreasing faster for me in subsequent rounds.

Considering the inflation rates and the previous offers, I propose a 60/40 split in your favor. This aims to balance the diminishing value of money while respecting the precedent set by the previous rounds.
